did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Methodist Episcopal Church of Churchville records, 1834-1962.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Methodist Episcopal Church of Churchville (Churchville, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes minutes of trustee elections, subscribers' list, and expenses and anniversary programs.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of album that includes trustee elections and other meeting minutes (1834-1836, 1846, 1863, 1870, 1868); subscribers' list for church steeple (1834); expense for church repairs (1855); donation agreement by Mary M. Whipple (1888); financial records 1917-1918); clippings; church history time line to 1962; centennial celebration program (1931); and One hundred and twenty-fifth anniversary program (1956).
